data.eml:eml: New species of the genus Parotoplana Meixner, 1938 (Proseriata, Otoplanidae) from southern Apulia (Italy)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Delogu, Valentina, Curini-Galletti, Marco (2007): New species of the genus Parotoplana Meixner, 1938 (Proseriata, Otoplanidae) from southern Apulia (Italy). Zootaxa 1529: 17-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177648
